__tnt.metering.init.push(function(){

    var lastDate = new Date(__tnt.recent.date.get());
    
    expireDate = expireDate.getTime();
    lastDate = lastDate.getTime();
    
    if(Number(lastDate)<Number(expireDate)){
        __tnt.log("resetting restrictions");
        var nextDate = new Date(expireDate+(__tnt.metering.config.days * 86400000));

        __tnt.recent.count.set(0);
        __tnt.recent.date.set(nextDate.getTime());

        __tnt.log(nextDate);
    }
});

// Set the 'read' variable if the current asset is in the recent assets list
__tnt.metering.init.push(function(){
    __tnt.log("checking whether user has read this before");
    
    var recent = __tnt.recent.assets.get();
    var uuid = __tnt.metering.config.uuid;
    
    var check = false;
    var i = 0;
    while(!check && i < recent.length){
        if(recent[i]==uuid){
            __tnt.log("found asset in recent");
            var check = true;
        }
        i++;
    }    
    
    if(check){
        __tnt.log("user has read this already");
        __tnt.metering.config.read = true;

        __tnt.log("not read before");
    }
});

__tnt.metering.access.c.push(function(){

    var cleanedReferrer = String(String(window.document.referrer).split('?')[0]).replace(/https\:\/\/|http\:\/\//,'').replace(/www/,'');
    var check = false;
    
    $.each(sites,function(){
        var regexp = String(this).replace(/\./g,'\\.').replace(/\,/g,'|');
    
        if(String(cleanedReferrer).search(regexp)>-1){
            __tnt.log("User arrived from site, entry granted");
        
            check = true;
        }else{
        	__tnt.log("User arrived from other site, no special access");
        }
    });
    
    __tnt.metering.config.referred = check;
    return check;
});
__tnt.metering.access.e.push(function(){

            }

    }
    });
// increment counter on new assets
__tnt.metering.access.e.push(function(){

__tnt.metering.access.d.push(function(){

    var bgColor = '#f7f7f7'.replace('#','');

    var bValue = parseInt(bgColor.slice(4,6),16);
    var bgColorRGB = rValue+','+gValue+','+bValue;
    
    $(lastPreview)
        .css({'position':'relative'})
        .append('<div class="redacted-overlay" style="position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:'+$(lastPreview).height()+'px;background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba('+bgColorRGB+',0), rgba('+bgColorRGB+',255) 80%);"></div>')
        .after('<div class="subscription-required"></div>');
    
    var count = __tnt.recent.count.get();
    var limit = __tnt.metering.config.sub_limit;

    if(count > limit){count = limit;}
    if(remaining < 0){remaining = 0;}
    
    var messageClass = 'subscription';
    if((count>=__tnt.metering.config.reg_limit)&&(count<__tnt.metering.config.sub_limit)){

    if(!message.length){ message = $('#template-metering').find('.template.meter.'+messageClass+'[data-count='+count+']').first(); }

});

__tnt.metering.compatibility = function(){
    var compatible = true;
    var status = "";
    
    /* this checks for compatibility with DOM storage */
    try{
        window.sessionStorage.setItem('__tnt.compatibility',true);
    }catch(e){

        status = "FAIL: setItem unsupported";
    };
    if(!compatible){
        __tnt.log(status);
    }
    return {'check':compatible,'status':status};
};
var bloxHasSubscription = false;
            var bloxServiceVerified = $.cookie('tncms-services-verified');

            /* if service not whitelisted check user service */
            if( bloxServiceVerified != 1 ){
                var bloxServiceIDs = [];
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4615);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(5319);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4522);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4523);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4524);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(5255);
                
                if (__tnt.user.services){
                    var bloxUserServiceIDs = __tnt.user.services.replace('%2C',',').split(',');
                    $.each(bloxUserServiceIDs, function(index, value){
                        var serviceID = parseInt(value);
                        if( serviceID != 0 ){
                            if( $.inArray(serviceID, bloxServiceIDs) > -1 ){
                                bloxHasSubscription = true;
                                return false;
                            }
                        }else{
                            bloxHasSubscription = true;
                            return false;
                        }
                    });
                }
            /* service has been whitelisted */
            } else {
                bloxHasSubscription = true;
            }

            /* check for whitelists once per day */
            if( !bloxHasSubscription && !bloxServiceVerified && typeof userWhiteList != 'undefined' && $.isArray(userWhiteList) ) {
                $.getJSON("http://herald-review.com/_services/v1/client_ip_info",function(data){
                    /* create a range */
                    var dataRange = data.ip.split('.');
                    dataRange = dataRange[0]+'.'+dataRange[1]+'.'+dataRange[2];
                    if( jQuery.inArray(data.ip, userWhiteList) > -1 || jQuery.inArray(dataRange, userWhiteList) > -1 ){
                        /* white list machine */
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 1, { path:'/' });

                        bloxHasSubscription = true;
                    } else {
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 0, { path:'/', expires:1 });
                        
                        __tnt.metering.check();
                    }
                });

            /* no access */
            }else if( !bloxHasSubscription ){
                __tnt.metering.check();
            }
            
            if(bloxHasSubscription){
                $('.subscriber-only.encrypted-content').each(function(){
                    $(this).html(tncms.unscramble($(this).text()));
                    $(this).show();
                });
                $('.subscriber-hide').show();
            }

            // show main content div
            $('#site-container').show();

            // hide loading spinner
            $('.subscriber-load').hide();
        });


    </script>

<div class="asset-content p402_premium subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>MAROA — The city of Maroa announced Thursday a boil order is in effect for residents living west of Wood Street and south of Washington Street, encompassing an area that includes Main, Lincoln, Elm, Cedar and Maple streets.</p>
</div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/herald-review.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-top, atf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-top-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center "><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/herald-review.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-inline-video, stf" data-dfp-size="[4,1]" data-lazy="true" id="fixed-inline-video" style="min-height:1px; min-width:4px;"></div></div>
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>The order was prompted by a water main break and it is expected the order will be lifted by the end of the week, depending on the results of water sample analysis.</p>
</div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/herald-review.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-middle, stf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-middle-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>

</div></div></div></div><script>
        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#sticky-right-rail');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="sticky-right-rail-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 80;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 80) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#tncms-region-global-container-bottom') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#main-bottom-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 80);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

<div class="infinity-summary-container hidden-print" id="infinite-container">
<div data-next-url="http://herald-review.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=79b41a68-a035-11e1-8c16-0019bb2963f4&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube" id="infinite-more">
<i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i>
</div>
</div>
<script>
        
            var bFoundOrigin = true;
            var sOriginID = null;
        
        var sOriginURL = scrubURL('http://herald-review.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=79b41a68-a035-11e1-8c16-0019bb2963f4&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube'); // original url scrubbed for preview
        var sFirstID = null;
        var bFirstRun = true;
        var bShowAd = true;
        var bInfiniStop = false;

        function populateInfinitySet(sURL) {
            sURL = scrubURL(sURL);

            // Until the origin paramter for cms.search.mlt functions, we have to start/stop the looping on our own
            // This will require not displaying any assets until we hit oAsset.
            // Then we loop through and display until we've been through everything up to our origin

            $.ajax(sURL).then(function(oResponse, sStatus, oXHR) {

                var sNextUrl = null;

                if (typeof oResponse.next_url == 'undefined') {
                    // URL supplied is no good. Revert to original URL
                    sNextUrl = sOriginURL;
                } else {
                    sNextUrl = scrubURL(oResponse.next_url);
                }

                // Manage response
                if (typeof oResponse.assets != 'undefined' && oResponse.assets.length > 0) {
                    
                    // Remove old more data
                    $("#infinite-more").remove();

                    
                    // Build infinity set
                    $.each(oResponse.assets, function(index) {
                            if (index == 1 && sOriginID == null) {
                                sOriginID = oResponse.assets[0].id;
                            }
                        // Display assets once origin is found
                        if (bFoundOrigin == true) {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                bInfiniStop = true;
                                sNextUrl = null;
                                $("#infinite-more").remove();
                                
                            } else if (bInfiniStop == false && this.id != '79b41a68-a035-11e1-8c16-0019bb2963f4') {
                                // Display asset
                                var sHTML = '';
                                if (this.content) {
                                    sHTML += '<div class="infinite-item original row"><div class="col-md-8">' + this.content + '</div><div class="col-md-4 text-center">';
                                    if (bShowAd == true) {
                                        // Show advertisement
                                        sHTML += '<div class="infinity-ad empty"></div>'
                                        bShowAd = false;
                                    } else {
                                        bShowAd = true;
                                    }
                                    sHTML += '</div></div><hr>';
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                // Origin found. Begin displaying assets
                                bFoundOrigin = true;
                            } else {
                                // Origin found is false. Skip asset
                                // Fail-safe in case origin is not present in set. This can be removed when origin is fixed.
                                if (bFirstRun == true) {
                                    // Stored first id
                                    sFirstID = this.id;
                                    bFirstRun = false;
                                } else if (this.id == sFirstID) {
                                    // We've started again. Force origin
                                    sOriginID = sFirstID;
                                    bFoundOrigin = true;
                                } // end Fail-safe
                            }
                        }
                        // Append infinity set to container
                        $("#infinite-container").append(sHTML);
                    });

                    // Include block_id on newly added list items
                    $('#infinite-container .infinite-item.original').each(function() {
                        var sHref = scrubURL($(this).find(".card-headline a").attr("href"));
                        
                        // Add to image and headlines links
                        $(this).removeClass('original')
                            .find(".card-headline a, .image a")
                            .attr("href", sHref + "#tncms-source=infinity-scroll-summary-siderail-latest");
                    });

                    // Check next URL
                    if (sNextUrl) {
                        // if origin hasn't been found yet and we hit next_url. Trigger the set to pull in again.
                        if (bFoundOrigin == false) {
                            // No origin yet. Call the populate function
                            populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                        } else {
                            // Append sNextUrl to infinity set
                            $("#infinite-container").append('<div id="infinite-more" data-next-url="' + sNextUrl + '"><i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i></div>');
                        }
                    }
                    
                        // Ad waypoint and handler to insert ads next to summary
                        $('.infinity-ad.empty').waypoint({
                            offset: '80%',
                            handler: function(direction) {
                                // Kill waypoint
                                this.destroy();
                                $(this.element).removeClass('empty');
                                // Create and append ad iframe. Make sure this occurs only once
                                var newIframe = infinityAd();
                                if($(this.element).children().length <= 0) {
                                    $(this.element).append(newIframe);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    
                    // Refresh waypoints
                    Waypoint.refreshAll();
                } else {
                    // Empty asset set returned. Go back in for a real set
                    populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                }
            });

<script>/*<![CDATA[*/

               iAttempt ++;

               var oEl = document.getElementById('tncms-recommendations-1393380' );
               if (!aAudiences || !aAudiences.length) {
                  //__tnt.log('No DMP audiences passed.');
                  
                    sMode = 'block-contextual-fallback';
                    //__tnt.log('Setting contextual audiences based on keyword.');
                    bDmpTrack = false; 
                    aAudiences = ["","updates","maroa","tony reid"]
                  
                  
                  if (!aAudiences || !aAudiences.length) {
                    //__tnt.log('No audiences or keywords to work with. Remove block');
                    $("#tncms-block-1393380").remove();
                    return;
                  }
               }

               for(var nIdx = 0; nIdx < aAudiences.length; nIdx++) {
                  aAudiences[nIdx] = aAudiences[nIdx].replace('keyword:', '');

               var oRequest = new XMLHttpRequest();

                     if (oResponse.assets.length <= 0) {
                         //__tnt.log('No assets in response.');
                         if (iAttempt < iMaxAttempt) {
                             //__tnt.log('Going in for more assets...');
                             getRecommendations_1393380();
                         } else {
                            //__tnt.log('No assets available for current audience.');
                            $("#tncms-block-1393380").remove();
                            return false;
                         }
                     }
                     
                     var aAssets = shuffle_1393380(oResponse.assets);
                     var sHTML = '';
                     var iCount = 0;
                     var iMax = 4;
                     for(var nIdx = 0; (nIdx < oResponse.assets.length && iCount < iMax); nIdx++) { 
                         if ( oResponse.assets[nIdx].content.includes('inline-summary') && !(oResponse.assets[nIdx].content.includes('79b41a68-a035-11e1-8c16-0019bb2963f4'))  ) {
                             iCount++;

Boil Water Alert In Clay Township, Harsens Island

May 17, 2012 at 8:35 am
Filed Under:Boil Water, Clay Township, Harsen's Island, St. Clair County, water, water main

CLAY TWP. (WWJ) – A boil water alert has been issued for Clay Township and Harsens Island in St. Clair County.

Clay Township officials say due to a problem with a water main, water supply to the island will possibly be intermittent throughout Thursday.

Officials from Harsens Island say the Clay Township Water Department is working on the problem, but if the water main break is more than 12 feet deep, it might not be fixed until Friday.

Residents are being asked to boil water for at least 24 hours or until notified differently.

WWJ Newsradio 950 and CBSDetroit.com will have any updated information as soon as it becomes available.

<script>
                    jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                        var sNavContainer = '#site-navbar-container';
                        var sBodyContainer = '#main-body-container';
                        var sNavHeight = $(sNavContainer).height();
                        var iUnfixPoint = 0;
                        if( __tnt.client.platform.ios ){
                            $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix-sticky');
                        } else {
                            $sNavScroll = false;
                            $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                                if( !$sNavScroll ){
                                    $sNavScroll = true;
                                    setTimeout(function(){
                                        var iFixPoint = $(sNavContainer).offset().top;
                                        var iCurrPoint = $(this).scrollTop();
                                        if( iCurrPoint >= iFixPoint && iCurrPoint > iUnfixPoint ){
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix') ){ 
                                                iUnfixPoint = iFixPoint;
                                                $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix').removeClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', sNavHeight+'px'); 
                                            }
                                        } else {
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix-top') ){ 
                                                $(sNavContainer).removeClass('affix').addClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', 0);
                                            }
                                        }
                                        $sNavScroll = false;
                                    }, 25);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    });
                </script>

<p>CHARLESTON, W.Va. -- West Virginia American Water has issued a boil-water advisory for approximately 200 customers in Ona. The affected area includes Blue Sulphur Road from Scout Camp Road to U.S. 60, River Park Avenue, Bias Drive, Bradbrook Drive, Betty Lane, Beechwood Drive, Meadow Lane, Fetty Drive, Lake Drive, Dixie Lou Drive, Olde Farm Road, Quail Drive, Woodcock Drive, Mourning Dove Drive, Hummingbird Lane, Thompson Road, Blue Sulphur Gardens Road and Scout Camp Road. The advisory follows a water main break.***The Cool Ridge-Flat Top Public Service District has issued a boil-water advisory for the Doc Miller Loop area in Cool Ridge. The advisory was issued following a water-main break.Customers in those areas should boil their water for at least one full minute prior to use until further notice.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"><div class="tncms-block" id="tncms-block-608361">

                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 80;

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 80) {

                            } else if (

Officials plan to review breaks, boil order

By JOSEPH BUSTOS - jbustos@shawmedia.com

FOX RIVER GROVE – The chairman of the village’s Public Works Committee said he expects the circumstances of recent water main breaks to be reviewed by village trustees.

Three water mains broke last week, leading to a boil order for the entire town from Thursday morning to Friday morning.

Trustee Mike Ireland, who oversees the Public Works Committee, said in-depth conversation about issues, such as water main breaks, normally takes place at the committee level.

Ireland said a public works employee was assigned to exercise, or open and close, the valves. During the process, one valve remained closed and one was partially opened, leading to an increase in pressure and the three water main breaks.

Ireland complimented the public works employees for their quick response and in making repairs to the system. “We were back to normal in less than 24 hours,” he said.

He said he expects the Public Works Committee to discuss the standard operating procedures for the process and have a discussion of the incident.

“We’ll still have additional discussion as far the who, what when, why ... and how do we avoid it,” Ireland said. “It was a mistake. It happens. We’re all humans.”

Boil Order Notice

EOL Water Supply Corporation has issued a boil water notice for all customers, in the Axtell area, north of Old Mexia Road.

Due to a major water line break earlier this afternoon all customers should boil their water for a full two minutes prior to consumption.

EOL will notify customers when it is no longer necessary to boil their water.

Officials reevaluate communicating boil water advisories

By: WECT Staff
Email
Connect
newsroom@wect.com
Officials in Whiteville are reevaluating how to tell area residents when they need to boil their water.

WHITEVILLE, NC (WECT) - Officials in Whiteville are reevaluating how to tell area residents when they need to boil their water.

Mayor Terry Mann says city workers were conducting random water testing last week when samples came back showing some of the water levels were abnormal.

Mann says that since the city runs on one water system, everyone in the city was impacted by the advisory.

WECT received phone calls at the station from people who wanted to know what was going on. Reportedly, so did emergency dispatchers.

Mann says they will test the water more frequently to make sure that it remains safe to drink.

<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<p>The City of Granger is giving its residents notice that the water has been turned off May 15, 2012, due to a major water leak on the east side of the city. The entire east side of the City of Granger will be without water until the leak is fixed (we have no idea at this time how long that will be).  The affected area will be Hwy. 95 and east. This will not affect the city west of Hwy. 95.</p>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset, atf","fold":"above","include_domain":null,"size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/taylorpress.net\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>
<div data-refreshable="true" data-region="fixed-big-ad-top-asset"><div class="tncms-region-ads" id="tncms-region-ads-fixed-big-ad-top-asset">
<div id="blox-ad-position-fixed-big-ad-top-asset1">
<script type="text/javascript">TNCMS.AdManager.render({region: 'fixed-big-ad-top-asset', slot: 1, fold: "above"});</script>
</div>
</div>
</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><p>The Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) required the City of Granger to issue a Boil Water Notice (BWN) to inform our customers that due to the possible presence of contaminants or an interruption of service, water from our system must be boiled prior to consumption. Residents will need to boil their water after it is turned back on until otherwise notified. The City will send out notice when the boil order is lifted.</p>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset, stf","fold":"span","include_domain":null,"size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/taylorpress.net\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>
<div data-refreshable="true" data-region="fixed-big-ad-middle-asset"><div class="tncms-region-ads" id="tncms-region-ads-fixed-big-ad-middle-asset">
<div id="blox-ad-position-fixed-big-ad-middle-asset1">
<script type="text/javascript">TNCMS.AdManager.render({region: 'fixed-big-ad-middle-asset', slot: 1, fold: "span"});</script>
</div>
</div>
</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"></div><p>The City of Granger offers its apologies for any inconvenience that out residents will incur due to this outage.</p>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-bottom-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-bottom-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-bottom-asset, btf","fold":"below","include_domain":null,"size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/taylorpress.net\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>

<script>
            $(window).load(function() {

                var bizTracked = [];
                var isUserAction = false;

                function trackActive(owl){
                    if( bizTracked.length == 40 ){
                        return;
                    }else{
                        var activeThings = $(owl).find('.owl-item.active');

                        $.each(activeThings, function(index, value){
                            var bizId = $(this).find('.card').data('bizid');
                            var hasBeenLogged = false;

                            bizTracked.forEach(function (item, index, array) {
                                if(item == bizId){
                                    hasBeenLogged = true;
                                    return true;
                                }
                            });
                            if( hasBeenLogged == false ){
                                bizTracked.push(bizId);
                                TNCMS.Tracking.addEvent({
                                    app: 'business',
                                    metric: 'block',
                                    id: bizId
                                });
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }

                window.card_carousel_1477499 = $('#block-1477499 .owl-carousel');

                

                card_carousel_1477499.owlCarousel({
                    loop:true,
                    margin:15,
                    nav:false,
                    dots:false,
                    slideBy: 'page',
                    autoHeight:false,
                    
                        autoplay: true,
                        autoplayHoverPause: true, 
                        autoplayTimeout: 5000,
                    
                    responsiveClass:true,
                    responsive:{
                        0:{
                            items:1,
                            stagePadding: 40,
                            nav:false
                        },
                        600:{
                            items:4
                        },
                        1000:{
                            items:2
                        }
                    }
                });

                // bind previous click
                $('#block-1477499 .owl-carousel-control.prev').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(e){
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    card_carousel_1477499.trigger('prev.owl.carousel');

                    isUserAction = true;
                    
                });

                // bind next click
                $('#block-1477499 .owl-carousel-control.next').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(e){
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    card_carousel_1477499.trigger('next.owl.carousel');

                    isUserAction = true;
                    
                });

                // bind dragged
                card_carousel_1477499.on('dragged.owl.carousel', function(event){
                    isUserAction = true;
                    
                });

                // bind translated
                card_carousel_1477499.on('translated.owl.carousel', function(event){
                    if( isUserAction ){

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&

            ) {

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){

                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 30) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            ) {

                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }

News Roundup

Boil order lifted for Brookridge community in Hernando County

NFL Power Rankings, Week 14: Patriots have new company at the top

RECOMMENDED READING

Times staff
Published: May 15, 2012
Updated: May 16, 2012 at 05:32 PM

BROOKSVILLE — Hernando County rescinded its boil water order for the Brookridge community Tuesday afternoon after receiving word that a retest of one of the community's water wells showed no signs of E. coli bacteria.

A test last week had shown the presence of the contaminant, so the county ordered that water for consumption and dish washing be boiled.

Distribution lines were never shown to have been contaminated, so utilities officials determined that the water disinfection systems worked.

No illnesses were reported.

Green Forest water OK; boil order lifted

Tuesday, May 15, 2012
Eddie Keever, Carroll County News

GREEN FOREST -- The city water system is back on line and a boil order was lifted on Monday after a 12-inch main water line broke Saturday.

According to Public Works Director Buddy Fry, the first reports of water pressure loss came in at 2:30 p.m. Saturday.

"Workers were able to locate the break that was just before it reached the Tyson plant," Fry said.

Once the break was found, it was isolated and had been patched by about 10 p.m., he added.

After that, the line was flushed out. There was no sign of any contamination, but the city was placed on a precautionary boil order that was lifted Monday morning after samples came back clean from the laboratory.

Production was off-line at the Green Forest Tyson plant Monday, but as of press time Monday night, production was scheduled to restart this morning.
